name: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Opacity
desc: An object that defines the opacity of an entity.

items.desc: Creates an opacity object using a custom material’s opacity property.

items.name: var texture: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Texture?
items.desc: The amount of opacity specified using a UV-mapped image.

items.name: static var textureSemantic: TextureResource.Semantic

items.desc: The amount of opacity, specified as a single value.

items.name: typealias PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Opacity.FloatLiteralType
